info.title: HybridComputeManagementClient
info.description: Azure Arc( Servers and K8s Clusters) API reference for Private Link's Scopes management.

get.description: Gets a list of all Azure Arc PrivateLinkScopes within a subscription.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope definitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of Azure Arc PrivateLinkScopes within a resource group.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope definitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successful request when deleting an Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

204.description: The specified PrivateLinkScope does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates (or updates) a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope. Note: You cannot specify a different value for InstrumentationKey nor AppId in the Put operation.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Properties that need to be specified to create or update a Azure Arc for Servers and Clusters PrivateLinkScope.

200.description: Successful request when creating or updating a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope. The updated PrivateLinkScope is returned.

201.description: Successful request when creating or updating a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope. The updated PrivateLinkScope was created and is returned.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing PrivateLinkScope's tags. To update other fields use the CreateOrUpdate method.

parameters.name: PrivateLinkScopeTags
parameters.description: Updated tag information to set into the PrivateLinkScope instance.

200.description: Updating the Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope's tags was successful. PrivateLinkScope tags are updated and returned with the rest of the PrivateLinkScope's object properties.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a Azure Monitor PrivateLinkScope.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a Azure Monitor PrivateLinkScope.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a specified private link resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a specified private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Approve or reject a private endpoint connection with a given name.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

200.description: Successfully approved or rejected private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a private endpoint connection with a given name.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

204.description: Private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all private endpoint connections on a private link scope.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope's validation details.

200.description: Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope validation details definition.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope's validation details for a given machine.

200.description: Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope validation details definition.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns a NetworkConfiguration for the target resource.

200.description: Network Configuration information for the target resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create or update the NetworkConfiguration of the target resource.

200.description: Successful request when creating or updating a NetworkConfiguration. The updated NetworkConfiguration is returned.

201.description: Successful request when creating or updating a NetworkConfiguration. The updated NetworkConfiguration was created and is returned.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Update the endpoint to the target resource.

200.description: Network Configuration information for the target resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the network security perimeter configuration for a private link scope.

200.description: Successfully retrieved network security perimeter configuration details.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the network security perimeter configurations for a private link scope.

200.description: Successfully retrieved network security perimeter configuration details.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Forces the network security perimeter configuration to refresh for a private link scope.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

networkConfigurationScopeResourceId.description: Associated Network Configuration Scope Resource Id

keyProperties.description: Public key information for client authentication

KeyProperties.description: Public key information for client authentication

NetworkSecurityPerimeterConfiguration.description: Properties that define a Network Security Perimeter resource.

properties.description: Properties that define a Network Security Perimeter resource.

NetworkSecurityPerimeterConfigurationPro.description: Properties that define a Network Security Perimeter resource.

provisioningState.description: Current state of this NetworkSecurityPerimeter: whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Provisioning ,Succeeded, Canceled and Failed.

networkSecurityPerimeter.description: The Network Security Perimeter associated with this configuration.

accessRules.description: Collection of access rules for the profile

enabledLogCategories.description: Collection of enabled log categories for the profile

ProvisioningIssue.description: Details on issues that occurred during provisioning.

suggestedResourceIds.description: ARM Ids of the resources that can be associated to the same perimeter to remediate the issue

suggestedAccessRules.description: Access rules that can be added to the perimeter to remediate the issue

values.description: Warnings can cause connectivity issues after provisioning succeeds.
Errors will cause association provisioning to fail.

AccessMode.description: Property that impacts a resource's logging behavior and its connectivity with other resources and public networks.

values.description: Indicates that resource access is controlled by the NSP definition.
Dry run mode, where traffic is evaluated against NSP Rules, logged but not enforced.
Enables traffic evaluation to fall back to resource-specific firewall configurations.

AccessRuleDirection.description: Indicates direction of an access rule.

addressPrefixes.description: Address prefixes that are allowed access.

NetworkSecurityPerimeter.description: Properties that define a Network Security Perimeter resource.

perimeterGuid.description: Guid of the Network Security Perimeter

NetworkSecurityPerimeterConfigurationLis.description: A list of network security perimeter configurations.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

ResourceAssociation.description: Properties that define a Resource Association.

TagsResource.description: A container holding only the Tags for a resource, allowing the user to update the tags on a PrivateLinkScope instance.

properties.description: Properties that define a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope resource.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Indicates whether machines associated with the private link scope can also use public Azure Arc service endpoints.

connectionDetails.description: List of Private Endpoint Connection details.

privateIpAddress.description: The private endpoint connection private ip address

linkIdentifier.description: The private endpoint connection link identifier

groupId.description: The private endpoint connection group id

memberName.description: The private endpoint connection member name

HybridComputePrivateLinkScopeProperties.description: Properties that define a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope resource.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Indicates whether machines associated with the private link scope can also use public Azure Arc service endpoints.

provisioningState.description: Current state of this PrivateLinkScope: whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Provisioning ,Succeeded, Canceled and Failed.

privateLinkScopeId.description: The Guid id of the private link scope.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The collection of associated Private Endpoint Connections.

HybridComputePrivateLinkScopeListResult.description: Describes the list of Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope resources.

value.description: List of Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope definitions.

nextLink.description: The URI to get the next set of Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope definitions if too many PrivateLinkScopes where returned in the result set.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: A list of private link resources

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

PrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: Properties of a private link resource.

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.description: Required DNS zone names of the the private link resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionDataModel.description: The Data Model for a Private Endpoint Connection associated with a Private Link Scope

id.description: The ARM Resource Id of the Private Endpoint.

name.description: The Name of the Private Endpoint.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of a private endpoint connection.

privateEndpoint.description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: Connection state of the private endpoint connection.

provisioningState.description: State of the private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpointProperty.description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

id.description: Resource id of the private endpoint.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionStatePropert.description: State of the private endpoint connection.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

description.description: The private link service connection description.

actionsRequired.description: The actions required for private link service connection.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: A list of private endpoint connections.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

PublicNetworkAccessType.description: The network access policy to determine if Azure Arc agents can use public Azure Arc service endpoints. Defaults to disabled (access to Azure Arc services only via private link).

values.description: Allows Azure Arc agents to communicate with Azure Arc services over both public (internet) and private endpoints.
Does not allow Azure Arc agents to communicate with Azure Arc services over public (internet) endpoints. The agents must use the private link.

PrivateLinkScopeName.name: scopeName
PrivateLinkScopeName.description: The name of the Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope resource.

PrivateLinkScopeId.name: privateLinkScopeId
PrivateLinkScopeId.description: The id (Guid) of the Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope resource.

GroupNameParameter.name: groupName
GroupNameParameter.description: The name of the private link resource.

LocationParameter.name: location
LocationParameter.description: The location of the target resource.

MachineNameParameter.name: machineName
MachineNameParameter.description: The name of the target machine to get the private link scope validation details for.

ResourceUriParameter.name: resourceUri
ResourceUriParameter.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource manager identifier of the resource to be connected.

NetworkConfigurationScopeId.name: scopeId
NetworkConfigurationScopeId.description: The id (Guid) of the Azure Arc Network Configuration Scope resource.

PerimeterName.name: perimeterName
PerimeterName.description: The name, in the format {perimeterGuid}.{associationName}, of the Network Security Perimeter resource.
